S.FORM: Aepulasite'.Tule Dei :Albrecht Dürer； cacay a malebut sepat a lasubu pitu a bataan idaw ku cacay (1471) a mihcaan lima a bulad tusa a bataan idaw ku cacay a dimiad katukuh i cacay a malebut lima a lasubu tusa a bataan idaw ku walu (1528) a mihcaan sepat a bulad enem a dimiad, Dekuo teban nu seci tu hedek, wenihusin sasinganganay numikulitay a tademaw, sapaday mikulitay a tademaw, mituktukay a tademaw atu nalimaan matinengay misilemed tu kamu a tademaw. Aepulasite'.Tule阿爾布雷希特•杜勒(Dei德語:Albrecht Dürer； (1471)年5月21日－1528年4月6日), . tusa a mihcaan tu pina cinida singanganay tu i sapaday amikulitay a tademaw mamin ku Ocuo a tademaw cinidaan, sakamusa ku tademaw cinidaan amisay wenihusin sakapahay nu sayaway nalimaan mikulitay a tademaw nu Ocuo mikulitay tu hekal a tademawan, nituktukan nida tu sapadan masabaluhay baluhan ku natangahan. . ci Tule misuayaw cinida tu Itali wenihusin a nikatinengan, alaen nida ku Luoma nakunkuan pataydan nida i Ocuo amisan a nalimaan, uyni han cinida malaamisay nu wenihusin sakaetiman nu mikulitay a tademaw, yadah tu ku kakamuen nida, picidekan han u sasausien nanay a sasausian, micumud atu udip a sakalecad. . naudipan生平 nilecuhan nida i Niw-lunpaw a misakinmay a luma, wama nida ci Aepu-laysite'.tule naw Cenya-li kungtin misangaay tu kim, sa malimad tayda i Niwlun-paw . "miinuli a lima祈禱的雙手"素描inpicu ku sapikulit wawa henay, ci Tule mikilul cinida ciamaan nida minanam tu nalimaan tu kim, sabaw tu lima a mihcaan malingatu tacuwacuwa micudad, mikilul ci Wake-muote' minanam mikulit atu mituktuk tu sapat, kilul sa taydan nida i Ae-sa'se , Pace-e atu Sete'la-sepaw . kilul sa u saka etiman nida pinanaman kina tusa tayda i I'tali miliwku, ci Tule tawya masasuadih cinida tu mikulitay a tademaw ci Ciw-wani. Pa'li'-ni atu ci lapai-e nuheni, mikinkiw tuni Tawensi a nalimaan atu nalimaan a kamuan, milihida tu nananaman tu wenyifusin a nidatengan atu wayway. . malawama tu numikulitay cinida自畫像之父 Tule i sabaw tu tulu a mihcaan (1484) cinida tu kumikulitay tu cinidaan, mikikaka tu ci Tawensian tu nalimaan a nikulitan tu mikiayaw tu tusa a bataan a mihcaan. . tunikaudipan nida, sabaw tu pina kunipikulitan tu cinidaan tu a kakulitan, pasu besut sananay anipisulitan, pakunida sa mikulit, i sapad mikulit atu simal a nikulitan tu natangahan a nalimaan, nikulitan cinidaan micidek kunipisadimel tn nalimaan, nalimaan a nipatahekal atu nikudanay ci Lunpuolan masasuadih. sisa, ci Tule pangangaan han matinengay mikulit tu udip a wama. Tule katalan, cacay a malebut lima a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku lima a mihcaan anikulitan tu ingki, nika ci Tule caay henay pakaadih tu katalan. ci Tule inikudan satu sakay tini i nalimaan tabaki kuni kalalidan, micidek kunipikulitan tu sapadan, tawyaay a tademaw mapalekal namin mangalay matineng tu nikulitan nida a kawaw, nikulitan nida itini sa i pinaay a macimacian a tahekal, u udip namin kumisingaay. kasingaanan nida mamin ku Ocuo matineng, mapalekal ku matinengay mikulit a tademaw ci Lpaie.senciaw ,Ticiannuo.wiciwlue atu ci Fuolansiseke.paemiciwninuo , mapacuduh atu mapalekal kinamikulitay, milihida tu mikulit i sapadan. ci Tule imalahulay a sapadan nu natangahan tu nalimaan malalit ku Deku o a matinengay mikulit a tademaw, mahida ci Linluo mitaneng mikulit tu i malahulay a sapadan, nikudan satu mitulin cinida tu wayway ni Tule tu adidiay madadecdecay anipikulitan. . Lukase. Fun.laytun cida a cacay itini i sabaw tu enem a secian tu ayaw tulu a bataan nu mihcaan malaheci nida ku tabakiay nu malahulay a sapadan mikulit tu Ocuo amisa nu mikulitay a tademaw. nika itini i cacay a malebut lima a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku lima (1515) a mihcaan tu nikudan, ci Marcantonio misatahaw tu baluhay a malahulay nu sapadan, milakuyd tu Aepaisesan misakakawaw tu amisay nu malahulay nu sapadan a kawawan, hamaw satu a mapalalid. Tule' mikinkiw tu nu tademawan atu milihida tu aenengan nu misumad tu misuayaw mikilim tu nikasumadan nu bihid anipikulitan mapale ku balucu ni Tasi.tanpusun ni kulitan"mulangaw atu wayway生長和形態", mahiniay ku sasakamuen nida. . sinicuo itini tu mihcaan i sepatay a bulad enem a demiad mikining ci Tule an, atu ci Lawlukase,ke'lanahe' atu Hans Burgkmair pulung han mikining. Hans Burgkmair一起紀念. Dekuo a Waehala a biyuan sapikining tu likisiay musakamu tu Deyi a kamuan nu tademaw- "cenceciw,cuncu, kesiaciw atu isu'ciw"a singanganay a tademaw, idaw kuni Tule pangkiway a sassing. . malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan

Aepolasite'.Tole Dei :Albrecht Dürer； cacay a malebot sepat a lasobo pito a bataan idaw ko cacay (1471) a mihcaan lima a bolad tosa a bataan idaw ko cacay a dimiad katokoh i cacay a malebot lima a lasobo tosa a bataan idaw ko walo (1528) a mihcaan sepat a bolad enem a dimiad, Dekoo teban no seci to hedek, wenihosin sasinganganay nomikolitay a tademaw, sapaday mikolitay a tademaw, mitoktokay a tademaw ato nalimaan matinengay misilemed to kamo a tademaw. Aepolasite'.Tole阿爾布雷希特•杜勒(Dei德語:Albrecht Dürer； (1471)年5月21日－1528年4月6日), . tosa a mihcaan to pina cinida singanganay to i sapaday amikolitay a tademaw mamin ko Ocoo a tademaw cinidaan, sakamosa ko tademaw cinidaan amisay wenihosin sakapahay no sayaway nalimaan mikolitay a tademaw no Ocoo mikolitay to hekal a tademawan, nitoktokan nida to sapadan masabalohay balohan ko natangahan. . ci Tole misoayaw cinida to Itali wenihosin a nikatinengan, alaen nida ko Looma nakonkoan pataydan nida i Ocoo amisan a nalimaan, oyni han cinida malaamisay no wenihosin sakaetiman no mikolitay a tademaw, yadah to ko kakamoen nida, picidekan han o sasaosien nanay a sasaosian, micomod ato odip a sakalecad. . naodipan生平 nilecohan nida i Niw-lonpaw a misakinmay a loma, wama nida ci Aepo-laysite'.tole naw Cenya-li kongtin misangaay to kim, sa malimad tayda i Niwlon-paw . "miinoli a lima祈禱的雙手"素描inpico ko sapikolit wawa henay, ci Tole mikilol cinida ciamaan nida minanam to nalimaan to kim, sabaw to lima a mihcaan malingato tacowacowa micodad, mikilol ci Wake-moote' minanam mikolit ato mitoktok to sapat, kilol sa taydan nida i Ae-sa'se , Pace-e ato Sete'la-sepaw . kilol sa o saka etiman nida pinanaman kina tosa tayda i I'tali miliwko, ci Tole tawya masasoadih cinida to mikolitay a tademaw ci Ciw-wani. Pa'li'-ni ato ci lapai-e noheni, mikinkiw toni Tawensi a nalimaan ato nalimaan a kamoan, milihida to nananaman to wenyifosin a nidatengan ato wayway. . malawama to nomikolitay cinida自畫像之父 Tole i sabaw to tolo a mihcaan (1484) cinida to komikolitay to cinidaan, mikikaka to ci Tawensian to nalimaan a nikolitan to mikiayaw to tosa a bataan a mihcaan. . tonikaodipan nida, sabaw to pina konipikolitan to cinidaan to a kakolitan, paso besot sananay anipisolitan, pakonida sa mikolit, i sapad mikolit ato simal a nikolitan to natangahan a nalimaan, nikolitan cinidaan micidek konipisadimel tn nalimaan, nalimaan a nipatahekal ato nikodanay ci Lonpoolan masasoadih. sisa, ci Tole pangangaan han matinengay mikolit to odip a wama. Tole katalan, cacay a malebot lima a lasobo cacay a bataan idaw ko lima a mihcaan anikolitan to ingki, nika ci Tole caay henay pakaadih to katalan. ci Tole inikodan sato sakay tini i nalimaan tabaki koni kalalidan, micidek konipikolitan to sapadan, tawyaay a tademaw mapalekal namin mangalay matineng to nikolitan nida a kawaw, nikolitan nida itini sa i pinaay a macimacian a tahekal, o odip namin komisingaay. kasingaanan nida mamin ko Ocoo matineng, mapalekal ko matinengay mikolit a tademaw ci Lpaie.senciaw ,Ticiannoo.wiciwloe ato ci Foolansiseke.paemiciwninoo , mapacodoh ato mapalekal kinamikolitay, milihida to mikolit i sapadan. ci Tole imalaholay a sapadan no natangahan to nalimaan malalit ko Deko o a matinengay mikolit a tademaw, mahida ci Linloo mitaneng mikolit to i malaholay a sapadan, nikodan sato mitolin cinida to wayway ni Tole to adidiay madadecdecay anipikolitan. . Lokase. Fon.layton cida a cacay itini i sabaw to enem a secian to ayaw tolo a bataan no mihcaan malaheci nida ko tabakiay no malaholay a sapadan mikolit to Ocoo amisa no mikolitay a tademaw. nika itini i cacay a malebot lima a lasobo cacay a bataan idaw ko lima (1515) a mihcaan to nikodan, ci Marcantonio misatahaw to balohay a malaholay no sapadan, milakoyd to Aepaisesan misakakawaw to amisay no malaholay no sapadan a kawawan, hamaw sato a mapalalid. Tole' mikinkiw to no tademawan ato milihida to aenengan no misomad to misoayaw mikilim to nikasomadan no bihid anipikolitan mapale ko baloco ni Tasi.tanposon ni kolitan"molangaw ato wayway生長和形態", mahiniay ko sasakamoen nida. . sinicoo itini to mihcaan i sepatay a bolad enem a demiad mikining ci Tole an, ato ci Lawlokase,ke'lanahe' ato Hans Borgkmair polong han mikining. Hans Borgkmair一起紀念. Dekoo a Waehala a biyoan sapikining to likisiay mosakamo to Deyi a kamoan no tademaw- "cenceciw,conco, kesiaciw ato iso'ciw"a singanganay a tademaw, idaw koni Tole pangkiway a sassing. . malalitin to ihekalay ato zomaay a natinengan
